nodes.text: The Southern Ewok Lake Village, also simply known as the Ewok Lake Village, was a small Ewok stilt village located on the forest moon of Endor in the Nub Shanda lake. It was inhabited by the Gondula tribe. The tribe also inhabited another stilt village further to the northeast.
The village hosted the Festival of Love following 0 BBY.

The Southern Ewok Lake Village appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
